=== Introduction ===
The main goals of Ubuntu-be does not include writing and maintaining documentation. This import job is already fulfilled by the larger <nowiki>[[[[https:--help.ubuntu.com-community-|Ubuntu]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-nl.org/|Ubuntu-nl]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://doc.ubuntu-fr.org/|Ubuntu-fr]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntuusers.de/| Ubuntu-de]]</nowiki> communities. However, Ubuntu-be can be used as a meeting point to coordinate documentations on subject specific to Belgium in the various languages spoken in our country.

=== Guidelines ===
Since we are dealing with Dutch, French German and English, some guidelines to try and keep a minimum of sync between translations:

==== For new articles ====
** Create article in Dutch on the articles <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-nl.org/|Nederlandstalige Ubuntu documentatie wiki]]</nowiki>. '''instructions for a ''portal page'' neeeded'''. Consider creating a stub articles for English, German and French translations.
** Create article in French on the <nowiki>[[http://doc.ubuntu-fr.org/|Ubuntu-fr Documentation wiki]]</nowiki>. Use the ''belgique'' tag to get your article linked from the <nowiki>[[http://doc.ubuntu-fr.org/belgique|belgique]]</nowiki> ''portal'' page. Consider creating a stub articles for Dutch, German and English translations.
** Create article in English on the <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/|Community Documentation wiki]]</nowiki>. Add your page to the <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/CategoryBelgianDocumentation|CategoryBelgianDocumentation]]</nowiki> category (see HelpOnCategories). Consider creating a stub articles for Dutch, German and French translations.
** '''instructions needed for articles in German'''
** In the head of your article, add links to the translations in other languages or <nowiki>[[https://bugs.edge.launchpad.net/ubuntu-belgium/+filebug|File a bug]]</nowiki> asking translations if there is no open bug dedicated to the page.

==== For modifications to existing articles ====
* '''Do not move or rename''' any articles unless absolutely necessary!
* For non-trivial modifications (content addition, major rewrite, etc.)
** Send a modification report <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-be|the mailing list]]</nowiki> (subscription required).
** <nowiki>[[https://bugs.edge.launchpad.net/ubuntu-belgium/+filebug|File a bug]]</nowiki> asking for translations if there is no open bug dedicated to the page.
** Consider warning reader of the other translations of the page that a more recent version exists in another language by adding a warning note on top of them.
